title: Private Patios and Balconies, Roll-down Solar Shades, Outdoor Yoga
posting_body: ['YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'FIND LUXURY AT OUR GLENDALE, CA APARTMENTS FOR RENT  Get the walk-ability you love and the luxury you expect from your downtown Glendale, CA apartment home.', 'Explore a new studio, one, or two-bedroom apartment with a boutique ambiance that keeps pace with your busy lifestyle and uncompromising taste.', 'The Harrison is a friendly and intimate community offering a true sense of connection and a real chance to get to know your neighbors in a relaxed setting.', 'Old school inspiration meets a new school approach to life at these Glendale apartments for rent.', ' You’ll appreciate spacious and modern residences ideal for entertaining as well as relaxing.', 'Enjoy day to night amenities that include a rooftop terrace with incredible views of the city, onsite fully equipped fitness center, resort-inspired pool & spa, onsite CVS Pharmacy and much more.', 'A few steps from your door, discover major shopping and dining.', 'L.A.’s nightlife, culture, and the Studios are only a short drive away.', ' Contact us today to book a tour and discover your new haven at our Glendale, CA luxury Apartments.', 'Welcome to distinction on your terms.', 'Welcome to The Harrison!', 'Amenities Include:', 'On-site CVS Pharmacy Steps to Major Shopping and Dining', 'Rooftop Deck with Expansive City and Mountain Views with with Entertaining Bar with TV', 'Ceiling Fans in Living Rooms and Bedrooms', 'Resort Style Pool and Spa', 'Club Room with Indoor/Outdoor Fireplace', 'Frigidaire Gallery Series Energy Star Stainless Steel Appliances with Gas Ranges', 'LA Nightlife and Culture', 'Roll-down Solar Shades', 'Fitness on Demand', 'European Styled Cabinetry with Modern Porcelain Tile Designer Backsplashes', 'Area Bocce Ball Courts', 'Parcel Pending 24/7 Package Delivery System', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
